name: Eggstreme Rolling
description:
Made for the Godot Wild Jam #28.

Sooo, is was my second game jam and i am quiet happy with the result. The idea is rather simple and i think i have seen something similar long ago. This time there is a tutorial so i hope nobody gets lost this time.

- Collect golden spheres and eggs to gain points.

- Roll and jump but dont break your egg.

- Reach the exit.

- Your worst enemy is steering behavior.

  • Godot Version: 3.2.3 stable
  • Not tested on Linux and MacOSX
  • It seems there is a bug in the HTML version (the golden egg schould respawn)
